attributes.title: 2022 Volkswagen Polo 1.0 TSI Life

attributes.description:
The largest, roomiest, most adventure-ready MINI is designed to handle everything your journey throws at you. Its powerful MINI Twin Power Turbo engine makes it all effortless. It delivers a smooth, powerful performance to give you greater reliability and responsiveness. Every exterior surface creates a bold visual energy, too. From the dramatic front bumper design and air intakes to the distinctive headlights, it promises both comfort and power. the more you drive it the more it begins to take on an identity of its own.
Fuel consumption of 5.5 litres/100km. This engine produces 100 kW and 220 Nm of torque. The power is transmitted to the road by the front wheel drive (FWD) with a 6 speed Manual gearbox.
With Motorplan, you don’t need to worry about costs for maintenance or repairs. You can extend your Motorplan for up to a maximum 7 years/200 000km.
